word: There were all kinds of trees around the temple to beautify the place\97the box, the pine, the fir, the oil, the myrtle, the pomegranate, and the fig tree bowed down with the weight of its timely figs; these made the place all over glorious. And as we were about to enter the temple, Jesus raised His lovely voice and said, \93Only the 144,000 enter this place,\94 and we shouted, \93Alleluia!\94
